programme.title: Love Chronicles
programme.desc: A DJ (Terrence Howard) and therapist (Robin Givens) help callers navigate relationship issues on air.

programme.title: Premium
programme.desc: A man realizes that he's still in love with his ex-fiancé a few days before her wedding to another man.

programme.title: Confessions of a Call Girl
programme.desc: A woman struggles with a secret addiction while trying to keep her family together.

programme.title: Cooley High
programme.desc: Chicago, 1964: Two teens navigate the end of high school in this authentic portrait of Black youth.

programme.desc: A couple’s move to spice up their bedroom with a third person sparks chaos in this provocative cult classic.

programme.desc: A therapist in a dull marriage discovers a secret club where she meets a seductive stranger with dark secrets.

programme.title: Hurricane Season
programme.desc: A year after Hurricane Katrina, a basketball coach gathers displaced students and rebuilds the team.

programme.title: Diggstown
programme.desc: Con man Gabriel (James Woods) bets that his boxer (Louis Gossett Jr.) can win a series of matches.

programme.title: The Mighty Quinn
programme.desc: Denzel Washington stars as a cop working to clear his friend's name of murder and theft.

programme.title: The Caveman's Valentine
programme.desc: Samuel L. Jackson stars as a cave-dwelling man who tracks down the killer of a homeless boy for justice.

programme.title: The Luau

programme.title: The Cookout
programme.desc: Determined not to forget his roots, a future NBA star throws a cookout in his new neighborhood.
